data.content: I saw on the internet a video of a frog floating in a magnet.  How does that happen?  Did the frog become magnetized? 我在互联网上看到了一个青蛙漂浮在磁铁中的视频。 这是怎么回事呢？ 青蛙被磁化了吗？

items.content: Frog, like most biological tissues, is diamagnetic
青蛙，像绝大多数生物组织，是抗磁性的
重力与抗磁力相互抵消了

data.content:
Several videos on the internet show small biological objects apparently defying gravity by floating in the bores of research magnets.   An example is shown below.  The fields used are very large (on the order of 1.5T) and the objects are very small (tadpoles, insects, blades of grass). 
互联网上的几段视频显示，小型生物物体明显地漂浮在研究用的磁体孔径中。下面显示了一个示例。使用的场强非常大（大约1.5T），物体非常小（蝌蚪，昆虫，草叶）
